mapper.insert:
insert into un_customer_user_permission (customerCode, customerUserCode, permissionCode, permissionName, permissionLevel, parentCode, addTime, updateTime, `enable`, activity, createrCode) values
( #{item.customerCode},null,#{item.permissionCode},#{item.permissionName},#{item.permissionLevel},#{item.parentCode}, now(),null,true,true,#{item.createrCode} )

insert into un_customer_user_permission (customerCode, customerUserCode, permissionCode, permissionName, permissionLevel, parentCode, addTime, updateTime, `enable`, activity, createrCode) values
( #{item.customerCode},#{item.customerUserCode},#{item.permissionCode},#{item.permissionName},#{item.permissionLevel},#{item.parentCode}, now(),null,true,true,#{item.createrCode} )
mapper.select: select * from un_customer_user_permission where customerCode = #{customerCode} and permissionCode = #{permissionCode} and customerUserCode is null and activity = true and enable = true
